A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie did what I did not think it could do\, make Star Wars feel new and fresh again\, it was excellent and the better than rogue one. The score was great as always\, the cinematography and sound design are award worthy and the actors all delivered. All the new characters like Rose Tico and the codebreaker fit organically into the story. The movie takes a direction you wouldn't expect and is satisfying. And while it is 2.5 hours long it was never boring
